turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to order some coffee from Peets.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And which store would you like to order from today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one in Millbrae, California?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. You mean the store on 401 Broadway?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that's right.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What can I order for you today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like a Havana Cappuccino please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it. And what size do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Medium.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. Is there a type of milk you prefer?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Almond milk please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great. Anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Extra foam would be great.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright. Would you like to order anything else today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope, that's all.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. To confirm, you want a medium Havana Cappuccino with almond milk and extra foam?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yep.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. I'll place the order at the Peet's on 401 Broadway, Millbrae, California.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sounds good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I have placed your order and it will be ready soon.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect, thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: A receipt of your order will be sent to your phone via text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great. Bye.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Goodbye.
